title: "We're Going Full Homebrew" - The Jeremy Story
itunes:title: "We're Going Full Homebrew" - The Jeremy Story
description:
Do as Unati does, prepare your incredibly valuable pencils, and get ready to take notes as we get ready to go full homebrew. Jeremy shares all the secrets of homebrewing campaigns, the importance of NPC's and creating exciting combat in a peek behind the screen of Nandi & The Scat Man.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Do as Unati does, prepare your incredibly valuable pencils, and get ready to take notes as we get ready to go full homebrew. Jeremy shares all the secrets of homebrewing campaigns, the importance of NPC's and creating exciting combat in a peek behind the screen of Nandi & The Scat Man.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.
